largeIconTeaser1.title: Fast Metadata Interaction
largeIconTeaser1.desc: With Fast Activation, you can publish property configuration changes from the Property Manager UI and API (PAPI) to the Akamai Production Network in approximately 15 minutes or to the Akamai Staging Network in approximately 3 minutes.

largeIconTeaser2.title: Fast Metadata Interaction
largeIconTeaser2.desc: With Fast Activation, you can publish property configuration changes from the Property Manager UI and API (PAPI) to the Akamai Production Network in approximately 15 minutes or to the Akamai Staging Network in approximately 3 minutes.
